t:
Feeling my heart beating faster, I touched my neck to find two different pulses.



Surprised, I pressed
harder to confirm
and felt something
shrieking and
moving deeper.
c:
I've never seen my friends, but always felt them.



#heartbeat #fast #pulse #scifi #parasite #creature
